name: Felicity Bloom
dialogue_tone: Enthusiastic and bubbly with a mix of business jargon and food-related puns. Felicity has a warm and inviting tone that often puts her clients at ease.

personality_traits.description: She loves having fun and finds joy in playful situations.
Felicity treasures her possessions, such as her rare spices and cooking utensils.
She pays great attention to detail in her work, aiming for flawless culinary experiences.

living_conditions: She enjoys a balanced work-life pattern, working as a Culinary Business Consultant which allows her to travel and explore different cuisines.
Maintains a cozy apartment adorned with her collection of rare cooking utensils and spices.
